title: Return to the Sky
description: BOOK #2 in the ABOVE THE SKY TRILOGY!From the author of the dystopian suspense thriller ABOVE THE SKY comes a heart-pounding sequel that climaxes with a shocking revelation you'll never see coming. RETURN TO THE SKY picks up just minutes after the conclusion of ABOVE THE SKY as eighteen-year-old Seven attempts to save those she loves in a dangerous world full of secrets.If you like fast-paced stories with mystery, suspense, adventure, romance, and shocking twists and turns that you never see coming, don't miss this unforgettable must-read sequel!
author: Jenny Lynne
